search.title: GlobalFoundries
search.snippet: 300 Fab [Fab 11] in China for growing semiconductor market in China. In 2016 GlobalFoundries licensed the 14 nm 14LPP FinFET process from Samsung Electronics

search.title: List of semiconductor fabrication plants
search.snippet: market. Operating fabs include foundries from TSMC, GlobalFoundries, Silex Microsystems, Tower Semiconductor, Advanced Micro Foundry, VTT, SilTerra and

search.title: TSMC
search.snippet: leading-edge 28 nm capacity, the leading Integrated Device Manufacturers such as Samsung and Intel that seek to offer foundry capacity to third parties

search.title: Semiconductor industry in China
search.snippet: the world in terms of number of new fabs under construction, with 8 out of 19 worldwide in 2021. A total of 17 fabs were expected to start construction
